extendedInfo.description: Browse the PFRPG Reference Document completely offline, with a five-level index with 16.100 choices, for a very fast consulting.PFRPG stands for PF Role Playing Game, the fantasy RPG by Paizo Publishing.The contents of the Reference Document are updated to 1 July 2013.There are also other feature:â¢ Multi-tab browsingâ¢ Search System, with the ability to search for any word in the index.â¢ It is also possible to search trough "Quick search box" widgetâ¢ Search in pageâ¢ Bookmarksâ¢ Support for large screen/honeycomb/tabletâ¢ Five-level index, with over 16.100 choicesâ¢ Completely offline browsingThis is a Lite version of the app, that contains only Core Rulebook (except magict items), Game Mastery  Guide and Ultimate Campaign*** This Lite version contain advertising and collects anonymous statistics usageMAIN INDEX************** Core Rulebook *******************(0) Getting Started(1) Races(2) Classes(3) Using Skills(4) Skill Descriptions(5) Feats(6) Equipment(7) Additional Rules(8) Combat(9) Magic(10) Spell Lists(11) Spell Index(12) Prestige Classes(13) Gamemastering(14) Environment(15) NPC Classes(16) Creating NPCs(17) Magic Items(18) Glossary************** Advanced Guide *******************(19) Races(20) Base Classes(21) Core Classes(22) Prestige Classes(23) Feats(24) Gear(25) Spell Lists(26) Spell Index(27) Magic Items(28) New Rules************** Advanced Race Guide *******************(29) Core Races(30) Featured Races(31) Uncommon Races(32) Race Builder(33) Age, Height & Weight(34) Spell Lists************** Ultimate Combat *******************(45) Magus(46) Spellcasting Class Options(47) Mastering Magic(48) Feats(49) Words of Power(50) Spells(51) Spell Lists(52) Updates************** Ultimate Equipment *******************(53) Arms and Armor(54) Gear(55) Magic Arms and Armor(56) Rings, Rods, and Staves(57) Wondrous Items(58) Artifacts and Other Items(59) Appendix************** Game Mastery *******************(60) Planar Adventures(61) Settlements(62) Fast Play Ship Combat(63) Chases(64) Disasters(65) Drugs and Addiction(66) Haunts(67) Hazards(68) Sanity and Madness(69) NPC Boons(70) NPC Monster Advancement(92) Universal Monster Rules(93) Creature Types(94) Monster Feats(95) Bestiary Monsters by Type(96) Bestiary Monsters by CR(97) Bestiary Monsters by Terrain************** Index *******************(98) Feats Index(99) Magic Item Index(100) Spell Index(101) Spell List IndexChangelog 1.3.7â¢Reference Update (Ultimate Campaign)Tags: rpg,d20,prd,pfrpg,pf,advanced,ogl,ogc,pfsrd, reviews.title: Don\'t download
reviews.comment: I wish I could give it 0 stars. Seriously.. Making an app to browse Pathfinder material that\'s under the OGL licence while all you do is download the PRD straight from the paizo site and then make people pay so they can view all the OGL content. Luckily I can either browse the site or use free apps that do allow you to see all of the content.
reviews.author: Aero Raver

reviews.title: Awesome App!!!
reviews.comment: A must for anyone who\'s playing pathfinder often.  Makes it easier to find info on the fly.
reviews.author: Shane Myers

reviews.title: Review #1
reviews.comment: Bloody amazing!  Thanks for such a great free app! Anyone wanting to be a pro dungeonmaster must download this!
reviews.author: Devin Patterson
